summary: This bill, H.R. 2740, proposes to modify the boundaries of the Talladega National Forest in Alabama. It specifically outlines the inclusion of new land as depicted on a map from September 6, 2024. The Secretary of Agriculture is authorized to acquire land, waters, and interests within the delineated area using existing land acquisition authorities, with a focus on voluntary acquisitions. Acquired land will be managed under existing National Forest System regulations.
